entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low 8.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 70 gusting to 90 near Haro Strait early this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023
